Blinken to travel to Israel, West Bank in week-long Gaza diplomacy push - State DeptU.S. top diplomat Antony Blinken will depart on Thursday for a week of diplomacy on Israel’s war in Gaza, visiting Israel and the West Bank, as well as Turkey, Greece, Jordan, Qatar, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia and Egypt over the next week, State Department spokesperson Matthew Miller told reporters. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 18:02:30 GMT AQLWIXXIDFODVLQI2HJQ2TAVAU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinking-travel-israel-west-bank-week-long-gaza-diplomacy-push-state-dept-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中东地区
Ukraine says it hit two Russian military targets in occupied CrimeaUkraine said on Thursday its air force conducted a strike on a Russian command post near the occupied city of Sevastopol more than 200 km from Kyiv-held territory, and also hit a military unit in a separate strike on the Crimean peninsula. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 17:42:07 GMT GO66XQYZ55PVVK7MTJMIKGXS5E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-hit-two- Russian-military-targets-占领-crimea-2024-01-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Houthi drone boat detonates in Red Sea a day after US warningA Houthi drone boat ladened with explosives detonated in the Red Sea on Thursday but failed to cause any damage or casualties, the U.S. Navy said, as the Yemen-based group continued its attacks in defiance of international calls to stop. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 17:39:58 GMT EOSJWB6VT5L37GVSKOWTI57CQM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthi-drone-boat-detonates-red-sea-day-after-us-warning-2024-01-04/Phil Stewart世界中东地区
Congo's Catholic and Protestant churches demand inquiry into election issuesDemocratic Republic of Congo's powerful Catholic bishops conference and Protestant churches on Thursday demanded an independent inquiry be opened into irregularities and alleged legal violations observed during December general elections. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 17:33:39 GMT NFWNBOOR3BODFOYX7MZDDOHQLU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congos-catholic-protestant-churches-demand-inquiry-into-election-issues-2024-01-04/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
Tourism in Israel grew in 2023, but slumped after start of warThe number of tourists visiting Israel rose in 2023 compared with 2022, although it plunged in October after war broke out between Israel and Hamas and remained low for the rest of the year, the Israeli tourism ministry said on Thursday. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 16:53:21 GMT FACPWLONRI3NC5B4N3I7RVJ6A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/tourism-israel-grew-2023-slumped-after-start-war-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中东地区
Mourners march, hold mass hug to remember Prague shooting victimsStudents and teachers remembered the 14 victims of the Czech Republic's worst mass shooting on Thursday as they formed a human chain to symbolically hug the university building where the gunman opened fire just before Christmas. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 16:14:08 GMT EQ2OQTAXY5OHFDGHCGUQJFJHHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/mourners-march-hold-mass-hug-remember-prague-shooting-victims-2024-01-04/Reuters世界欧洲
Islamic State claims responsibility for attacks that killed nearly 100 people in Iran - group on telegramIslamic State claimed responsibility on Thursday for two explosions that killed nearly 100 people and wounded scores at a ceremony in Iran to commemorate commander Qassem Soleimani, who was killed by a U.S. drone in 2020. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 16:04:17 GMT L2GRF7X2N5PEXD4G5JUDJC34WQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/islamic-state-claims-responsibility-for-attacks-that-killed-nearly-100-people-in-iran-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中东地区
Slain Hamas deputy chief buried in Palestinian camp in BeirutThe slain deputy chief of Hamas, Saleh al-Arouri, was buried in the Palestinian camp of Shatila in Beirut on Thursday, amid throngs of mourners launching volleys of gunfire. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 16:03:55 GMT JUYIRTCMIFK5PKJK652BP2THREAD https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hamas-deputy-chief-buried-palestinian-camp-beirut-2024-01-04/Reuters世界中东地区
US Senators urge Tesla, other automakers to stay neutral in union organizingA group of 33 senators on Thursday urged Tesla and 12 other automakers to remain neutral in ongoing efforts by the United Auto Workers (UAW) to organize U.S. auto plants. Thu, 04 Jan 2024 16:01:57 GMT 4337SFOOLBM7PPP5256PWWL2WQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/senators-urge-tesla-12-other-automakers-remain-neutral-organizing-drives-2024-01-04/David Shepardson商业汽车与交通

Explainer: Ukraine considers changing mobilisation rules as war with Russia drags onA Ukrainian parliamentary committee met to review proposed changes to the rules on army mobilisation and tighten sanctions against draft evasion as the war with Russia drags on.
